summary: This code imports necessary libraries, loads a sound file, calculates the RMS (Root Mean Square) value of the audio signal, and then plots it using matplotlib.

details.comment: This code imports necessary libraries, loads a sound file, calculates the RMS (Root Mean Square) value of the audio signal, and then plots it using matplotlib.
details.content:
import librosa
import librosa.feature
target = "sample.wav"
ld = librosa.load(target)
sample = librosa.feature.rms(ld[0])
#print(sample)
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
plt.plot(sample.T)
plt.show()
